transcription: Welcome to Carlin & Gazzard and thank you for your inquiry on the 2013 E200 sedan. Presented in polar white, this car shows exceptional value with only 45,000km being driven. Interior of the car looks very classy and elegant with the seats wrapped in a black man made leather and the trim finished off in a black leather.  high gloss ash wood.
